title: Rustc SIGSEGVing on musl on big packages (e.g. gtk-rs)

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Backtrace:

```
#0  0x00007f4b4ace1395 in llvm::CallGraphSCC::ReplaceNode(llvm::CallGraphNode*, llvm::CallGraphNode*) () from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
[Current thread is 1 (LWP 31497)]
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f4b4ace1395 in llvm::CallGraphSCC::ReplaceNode(llvm::CallGraphNode*, llvm::CallGraphNode*) () from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
#1  0x00007f4b4abec9c6 in ?? () from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
#2  0x00007f4b4ace172b in ?? () from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
#3  0x00007f4b4a58aa6d in llvm::legacy::PassManagerImpl::run(llvm::Module&) ()
   from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
#4  0x00007f4b4a534bf9 in LLVMRunPassManager () from /usr/lib/libLLVM-9.so
#5  0x00007f4b4d47a542 in <rustc_codegen_llvm::LlvmCodegenBackend as rustc_codegen_ssa::traits::write::WriteBackendMethods>::optimize ()
   from /usr/lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/codegen-backends/librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.so
#6  0x00007f4b4d35945a in ?? ()
   from /usr/lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/codegen-backends/librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.so
#7  0x00007f4b4d384036 in ?? ()
   from /usr/lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/codegen-backends/librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.so
#8  0x00007f4b4d384db4 in ?? ()
   from /usr/lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/codegen-backends/librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.so
#9  0x00007f4b4f67180a in __rust_maybe_catch_panic ()
   from /usr/bin/../lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/lib/libstd-15ba9bb207f0001d.so
#10 0x00007f4b4d3851d3 in ?? ()
   from /usr/lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/codegen-backends/librustc_codegen_ll--Type <RET> for more, q to quit, c to continue without paging--c
vm-llvm.so
#11 0x00007f4b4f66a38f in ?? () from /usr/bin/../lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/lib/libstd-15ba9bb207f0001d.so
#12 0x00007f4b4f63c8f0 in ?? () from /usr/bin/../lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/lib/libstd-15ba9bb207f0001d.so
#13 0x00007f4b4f6711f6 in ?? () from /usr/bin/../lib/rustlib/x86_64-alpine-linux-musl/lib/libstd-15ba9bb207f0001d.so
#14 0x00007f4b5206c72b in ?? () from /lib/ld-musl-x86_64.so.1
#15 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
```

This happens occassionally on both Alpine Linux and Void Linux musl, I'd say maybe every 4th time something is compiled with it. Not quite sure how to pin this down further.
